title: Is baby oil good for your face? How should you use it?

og.title: Is baby oil good for your face? How should you use it?
og.description: Answer (1 of 16): Oddly enough, it seems to work. People who use baby oil at night on acne-prone skin get clearer, matte complexions in a few weeks. The key to success seems to be to make your skin is thoroughly cleansed before you apply the oil. That doesn't mean you have to scrub your skin (scr...
